snippet.title: The Angels on tour with Rose Tattoo in Wollongong
snippet.content:
John and Rick Brewster from The Angels. Picture: Supplied
The Angels have released their highly anticipated new album Brothers, Angels & Demons to coincide with the announcement of a national tour of the same name.
"This show will encompass some aspects that aren't always a part of the show, like Rick [Brewster] playing some keyboards, some acoustic performances and the odd special guest. These shows will knock the fans out," said guitarist John Brewster.
Some of the guests joining them at different locations will be Diesel, Mi-Sex, Rose Tattoo, and Hitmen DTK (the last two appearing in Wollongong). It comes as the band celebrates five decades of rock with a tell-all biography, penned by industry alumnae Bob Yates, The Angels.
An intimate run of book shows talking about the behind-the-scenes happenings of the iconic band have been scheduled.
